deploy_cmd: docker compose build --pull && docker compose down && docker compose up -d
backup_cmd: cd ~/apps/yoshwiki && source .env && docker exec yoshwiki-db mariadb-dump -u root -p${DB_ROOT_PASSWORD} wikidb --single-transaction | gzip > ~/backups/yoshwiki/yoshwiki.gz && tar cf ~/backups/yoshwiki/images.tar images
